Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by Houston in 1971...
Injured on 5/13/1976 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1978, off Bill Dillman (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/10/1978, off Dave Lemanczyk (PIT)...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/6/1978, hitting .474 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1978, hitting .336 with 13 HR, 83 RBI...
Injured on 6/12/1979 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Won World Series with Houston in 1979...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1980, hitting .545 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1980, hitting .410 with 3 HR, 21 RBI...
Traded from Houston to Los Angeles on 1/31/1981 (Going to LA: 3B J. Mumphrey, 2B J. Orta, P J. Palmer. Going to HOU: P C. Speck, C G. Goossen, 2B D. Garcia, CF R. Craig)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Pittsburgh on 6/1/1981...
Injured on 4/2/1982 with a Fractured Knee, out for 5-6 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (N) on 6/18/1982...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (N) on 9/7/1982...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1984, hitting .407 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Cincinnati on 7/15/1984...
Traded from Los Angeles to Cincinnati on 2/10/1985 (Going to LA: P J. Wetteland, P T. Crews, C T. Munson, P S. Rogers. Going to CIN: 3B J. Mumphrey, DH K. Moreland, LF B. Downing)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1985, hitting .458 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against St. Louis on 8/9/1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1988, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Had 2000th career hit on 7/11/1989, off Steve Ontiveros (HOU)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1990, hitting .542 with 5 HR, 10 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against New York (N) on 4/19/1990...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1990, hitting .396 with 7 HR, 25 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1990, hitting .591 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Atlanta, driving in 6 runs on 10/2/1990...
